front.div:
A unique solution for high performance, high-speed 2-way
broadband communication, The OrSat system ensures superior
quality of connectivity for comprehensive on-board
communication and entertainment applications. With an exclusive
mechanical design, compact dimensions, no 'keyholes' for
continuous zenith-horizon communications and a built-in RF
package of 4 or 8W BUC, Orbit's turnkey OrSat (AL-7103 MKII)
solution provides 1 Mbps, typically outbound data rate in an unmatched performance
to size ratio.
